item.title: ubuntu文档系统
item.description: 文档路径 系统apt安装的文档一般在/usr/share/doc下 源码编译的工程文档一般在/usr/local/share/doc下 如uhd, gnuradio man路径 /usr/share/man/ /usr/local/share/man user commands system calls C lib devices and special files file formats and conventions Games miscellanea system admin tools and daemons
